org.aoplib4j.uml
Class PngWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.aoplib4j.uml.SequenceDiagramWriter
      org.aoplib4j.uml.DFSDiagramWriter
          org.aoplib4j.uml.PngWriter

public final class PngWriter
extends DFSDiagramWriter

Writer that will generate the UML diagram as a PNG file. The writer use under the hood the SEQUENCEWriter writer to generate a .seq diagram and then use SEQUENCE with the --headless option which is used when you want to generate a .png image from an input file without displaying the SEQUENCE screen. The writer will create 2 files; the first one having as name the value passed as parameter to the Aoplib4jSequenceDiagram.diagramDepth() (which is a seq file) and the second file which is the png file.

Author:
Adrian Citu
See Also:
SEQUENCEWriter

generateThePngFile

private void generateThePngFile(java.lang.String diagramFullPath)
Generate the png file. Verify if SEQUENCE jar is in the classpath and then invoke by reflection the SEQUENCE_MAIN_CLASS main method with --headless diagramFullPath parameters.

Parameters:
diagramFullPath - the diagram full path.

loadClass

static java.lang.Class<?> loadClass(java.lang.String classToLoad)
Load (and return) from the classpath the class pass as parameter. The method is package protected only for testing purposes.

Parameters:

Returns:
The loaded class or null if the class in not in classpath.
